comment_text: Don't try to get money while you are 16. At least if you don't need it badly. Build stuff, you'll learn so much more. I am 27 and two kids, getting paid a lot but I regret the time where I could spend hours on my own project. Now if I have an hour per week I am happy.
author: __xtrimsky
story_title: Ask HN: How does a 16 year old go about getting work on software?
